title: Birdcage, ca. 1901
medium: Buffalo horn, lacquered bamboo, ivory, tortoiseshell, cedar wood, various metals, jade, porcelain
description: Circular flattened dome shape with large metal finial and hook; laquered bamboo hoops at intervals around horn bars; tortoiseshell band around base; three intricately carved and pierced triangular ivory feet. Decorations on or in cage of: carved ivory crab housing metal food (or water?) container;  intricately carved ivory fish with human figure on its back, metal spring antennai-like projections at eyes, as stand for for short, cylindrical jade water container(?); arched carved and pierced ivory panel at door; turquoise glazed porcelain bowl with scene of crane in landscape; carved ivory standing figure (perch support?) in center of cage floor. Metal handle on underside of floor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Birdcage, ca. 1901.
ca. 1901. Buffalo horn, lacquered bamboo, ivory, tortoiseshell, cedar wood, various metals, jade, porcelain. Gift of Mrs. Herman Frasch. 1916-12-1-a/f.
